title: FORMING CLASH TEAM GOLD OR ABOVE LF ALL ROLES
body:
Forming clash team my exp is a 10W/5L INC 2 brackets won over these past clash events and playing up to tier 2 but all in other peoples teams who came in unprepared, I like winning so I want like minded people who don't mind a little more effort coming in prepared. Come get these dubs if your ready for it! :P

Add: uzuwu

replies.body:
wow add you and get told your not gold and deleted..... retard
plat last season only just done my 10 games.
